Armada



Armada: I'm in the Alliance base.


(Armada says back to Airbombe=
r.)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 PM
  Subject: Re: Big =
Post(with fries)


  Airbomber: I'm in the Maximal base, Infectra. Where ar=
e you?...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:08 AM
    Subject: =
Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Armada


    Armada: Baby? That doesn't soun=
d like you..But, anyway, where are you?

      ----- Original Message -----=
 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent=
: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:01 AM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


=
      Airbomber: I'm here with Time Warp, come on baby, you know it's me! I=
'm black and white, I change into a cheetah, well I used to, but I like my =
robot mode, and I got inhaled by that guy, remember?...
        ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM
        Subject: Re: Big P=
ost(with fries)


        Armada



        Armada: Airbomber? How can I be=
 sure that's you?


        (Armada awaits an answer.)
          ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
          From: Soulstice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
          Su=
bject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


          Arrow puts Airbomber on.

     =
     Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you really?...
            ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
            From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
            Subje=
ct: Re: Big Post(with fries)


            Armada



            Armada: Ai=
rbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


          =
  (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

              ----=
- Original Message ----- 
              From: Soulstice Omega 
            =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:=
17 AM
              Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


              Arrow=
: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

              Airbomber: =
You can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to pose as=
 her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

              Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to=
 you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
                ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                From: *Orchid* 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
                Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
                =
Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                Armada



             =
   (Armada listens to the voice coming over her commlink.)


              =
  Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who =
is this?


                (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an ans=
wer from Arrow.)

                  ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
         From: Soulstice Omega 
                  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
                  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
              =
    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                  Airbomber: But wh=
ere do we go?

                  Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I =
wouldn't lie to you.

                  Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie=
 to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

                  Strana=
to: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

                  Airbomber: But ho=
w can that be?

                  Arrow: Call her.

                  Airbo=
mber: I tried that.

                  Arrow: You don't keep track of those=
 kind of things? I'll call her.

                  Arrow calls Armada by co=
mmlink.

                  Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...
=

                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From=
: Alloran2@... 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
       =
             Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
                    Sub=
ject: Big Post(with fries)


                    OOC: Please add the new De=
stron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
                    Syria. =


                    :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

           =
         Ramjet: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  Th=
ey are led 
                    by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, =
and are enemies of the Maximals 
                    and Alliance.  The oth=
er one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
                    =
of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might=
 
                    be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
         =
           ~~~~~ 
                    Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-ty=
pe shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
                    ~~~~~ 
        =
            Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, =
for they will 
                    be the most likely to cooperate.  Even s=
o, there are a lot of warlike 
                    Maximals, so be ready fo=
r anything. 
                    ::he walks out of his cave and starts flyi=
ng to the CF:: 
                    ~~~~~ 
                    ::Time Warp =
was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
            =
        said about Infectra:: 
                    Time Warp: Infectra?! In=
 the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
                    de=
finately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
 =
                   guys are fools.
